original_text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body's sake, which is the church:
korean_text: 나는 이제 너희를 위하여 받는 괴로움을 기뻐하고 그리스도의 남은 고난을 그의 몸된 교회를 위하여 내 육체에 채우노라

sentences.original_text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 위하여 받는 고난에 기뻐하는 나

sentences.original_text: and fill up that which is behind
of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh
